metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44570 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Range header parsing component of Rack >= 1.5.0. A Carefully crafted input can cause the Range header parsing component in Rack to take an unexpected amount of time, possibly resulting in a denial of service attack vector. Any applications that deal with Range requests (such as streaming applications, or applications that serve files) may be impacted.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
